document.full_text: a federal judge on thursday sentenced two former new orleans police officers to long prison terms prison for their roles in killing a man and burning his body during the aftermath of hurricane katrina.
document.title: former cops sentenced in post-katrina killing
lines_and_colors: a federal judge on thursday sentenced two former new orleans police officers to long prison terms prison for their roles in killing a man and burning his body during the aftermath of hurricane katrina.
